name: Creative Technology
description:
Core member of the Creative Technology group within the Disney Digital Network dedicated to creating captivating, high-end experiences, focusing on increased engagement, audience growth, and monetization opportunities.

All interactive experiences are built responsively with a mobile-first mentality, for cross-network distribution, using emerging technologies to create interactive experiences & push the boundaries of traditional web and application development.

Projects also include CT Game Engines

images.caption: Created branding identity and designed and developed Creative Technology internal portfolio site. Includes dynamically shifting color themes based on the CT logo identity study, and SVG animations.

An interactive pi√±ata that cracks progressively over 4 clicks, fully opening on the 4th crack to reveal the following options: a button with a CMS programmable link. Shower of objects of a single CMS programmable image from the top of the module i.e. falling candy.
An experiment to bring an SVG image to life, using CSS animation to add motion and interactivity.

An interactive coloring book, where the SVG's white areas are converted to paintable spaces that can be filled with a variety of colors and patterns. Synced with Disney Interactive's internal CMS configuration options, so that the images, internationalized text translations, colors & tool types can be customizable and programmable.
Utilizes SVG's to create a responsive, dynamic coloring surface that capitalizes on Disney's plethora of publishing content, and brings the physical coloring book into the digital space.
In addition to various painting tools, users can undo/redo their most recent action, clear the entire image to the original state, download/save the image, and print.
